text: today I'm still rolling on the Scale & Crop screen. The scaling is done, and I've ironed out an issue with the image picker on iPad. Still working on the crop action and the insertion of the cropped image into the movie frames.

Also, had a realization: Since we're already displaying a view over the scaling image (the overlay is currently the yellow grid), we could very easily replace that with, say, a view containing some text labels. Just a thought. If we want to explore that it wouldn't take much development.
<@U026PT0D7> text labels as in the title/director text?
or even scaling and cropping while there's an onionskin above it
opacity is trivial to change from a dev point of view
